arts.ttl: Lincoln City 0 Exeter City 0 - Grecians controversially denied late winner - Devon Live
arts.sum: In stoppage-time though Exeter thought they’d grabbed one when Jack McMillan lashed home a finish, only for it to be ruled out controversially for a handball in the build-up. Exeter City: Joe Whitworth, Ed Turns, Angus MacDonald, Alex Hartridge, Jack McMillan, Ed Francis, Ben Purrington, Caleb Watts (Sonny Cox, 65), Demetri Mitchell (Pat Jones, 76), Josh Magennis

arts.ttl: Exeter boss Gary Caldwell sees red in bore draw at Lincoln
Exeter City hope to extend unbeaten run since return from Spain
arts.sum: “We were in a difficult situation, we’re still in a difficult situation and we want to win more games and finish the season on a real high but it’s good to see a group of players that have been newly-formed, to see that togetherness and the partnerships that have been formed and the team coming together and the stuff we do in the training pitch working and coming together in games. But I also know when we were in a difficult run that you don’t look at the league table, it’s just going to create anxiety and negativity.

arts.ttl: I captained Exeter City to promotion - now I want success with non-league rivals
arts.sum: After a challenging two years at Colchester United, Jay signed for National League South side Torquay United in this season's January transfer window, but it was a move that had been in the works six months prior to that. It is no surprise Jay describes this area of the country as 'home' with the two seasons at Colchester his only spell away and though he is now at a different club, there are plenty of familiar faces.

arts.ttl: Pierce Sweeney out for the season as Exeter City skipper needs surgery
arts.sum: EXETER City captain Pierce Sweeney will miss the rest of the season as he requires surgery on an ongoing hip problem. The 30-year-old defender, who is closing in on 400 appearances for the Grecians now, has not played since the 2-1 home defeat to Barnsley when he picked up a calf injury, but manager Gary Caldwell revealed it is a long-standing issue with his hip that is causing him problems.

arts.ttl: Preview: Lincoln City vs. Exeter City - prediction, team news, lineups
arts.sum: Sports Mole previews Saturday's League One clash between Lincoln City and Exeter City, including predictions, team news and possible lineups.
